programme.title: Status Selebritis Ep7
programme.desc: Mendedahkan fakta-fakta melalui peristiwa terkini berkaitan status selebriti dengan panduan laman web. Status Selebritis memaparkan aktiviti terkini selebriti di Indonesia.

programme.title: D'Academy Asia 6 Ep24
programme.desc: D'Academy Asia dengan slogan "Suara Sejati Asia" adalah pertandingan menyanyi dangdut tingkat Asia. Negara berikutnya yang akan bergabung dalam DA Asia 6 adalah Trkiye! Bersiaplah menjadi bintang dangdut terbesar di Asia!

programme.title: Once In A Summer
programme.desc: A young couple in 1969 meet and fall in love in the midst of economic and political changes and get swept up and torn apart by the political tensions of the time.

programme.title: Friend: The Great Legacy
programme.desc: Joonsuk recruited Sunghoon, a young guy he met in prison, to help him in the gang. Little did he know Sunghoon was the son of Dongsu, whom he was suspected to kill.

programme.title: Swing Kids
programme.desc: The story of a North Korean soldier who joined the tap dancing team "Swing Kids" in the Geoje prison camp during the Korean War.

programme.title: Cadaver
programme.desc: 6 med students participate in their first anatomy class, yet nightmare begins when they are assigned with a deadly beautiful cadaver.

programme.title: The Merciless
programme.desc: A notorious gangster teams up with a prison newbie to take over the crime ring, yet the trust between shaken when their ulterior motives come to light.

programme.title: My Worst Neighbor
programme.desc: In a house with little soundproofing, a man and a woman living next door started a noise war. They then cohabitate through the wall, and catching up in subtle emotions...

programme.title: Officer Of The Year
programme.desc: The competition to see who makes the most arrests heats up between two cops from rival stations when they're forced to work together to catch a criminal.

programme.title: Memories Of Murder
programme.desc: Based on a true story, the film follows the path of three detectives as they investigate the grisly rapes and ritualistic killings of local women in small-town of South Korea in 1986.

programme.title: Rampant
programme.desc: Returning from imprisonment abroad, a prince and his fellow countrymen band together to battle bloodthirsty demons in ancient Korea.

programme.title: Dancing Queen
programme.desc: A married couple in the midst of their mundane lives decides to pursue their lost dreams. The husband finds himself accidentally running for Mayor of Seoul and his wife decides to become a pop singer.

programme.title: 1987: When The Day Comes
programme.desc: In 1987, a pro-democracy student activist was captured and tortured to death by the police. The authorities tried to cover up the case, but the ordinary people fight to reveal the truth.

programme.title: Be With You
programme.desc: Before her death, a woman promises her family that she would return on a rainy day, one year later. Miraculously, she reappears before her husband and son but has no memory about her past.

programme.title: Wonderful Ghost
programme.desc: A patrol officers soul gets separated from his body while he was investigating a case. Unexpectedly he discovers his neighbor who runs a judo studio is the only person can see him.

programme.title: Going By The Book
programme.desc: Things get out of control when an eager traffic cop who tends to do things by the book was chosen to act as a bank robber in a drill.

programme.title: My Girlfriend Is An Agent
programme.desc: A secret agent couple goes behind each others backs, unknowingly on the same mission to stop a Russian organized crime ring from stealing an advanced bio-chemical weapon.

programme.title: Spiritwalker
programme.desc: A man loses memory and wakes up in a new body every 12 hours. In search of his identity, he met a woman who claims to know him.

programme.title: Door Lock
programme.desc: A woman, living by herself, finds her door lock cover left open one day. Startled by this, she starts investigating on her own and finds more hints of someone trying to enter her home.

programme.title: War Of The Arrows
programme.desc: Set during the second Manchu invasion of Korea, Nam Yi, the best archer in Korea, goes up against the Qing Dynasty to rescue his younger sister Ja In - who was to be enslaved by the Manchurians.

programme.title: Yoga
programme.desc: Hyo-jung is insecure about her appearance. She joined the yoga academy wishing to restore beauty, yet strange things begin to unfold...

programme.title: Along With The Gods: The Last 49 Days
programme.desc: The three grim reapers will guide their 49th soul Kim Soo-Hong to the underworld trials. Meanwhile, God of House will recover the grim reapers' memories from 1,000 years ago.

programme.title: Double Patty
programme.desc: An aspiring news anchor and a struggling wrestler meets by chance at a burger joint. Through shared meals, they encourage each other to reach for their dreams!

programme.title: The Pension
programme.desc: When four different couples head to a motel for different reasons, truths are revealed and secrets are uncovered.

programme.title: Friend: The Great Legacy
programme.desc: Joonsuk recruited Sunghoon, a young guy he met in prison, to help him in the gang. Little did he know Sunghoon was the son of Dongsu, whom he was suspected to kill.

programme.title: The Point Men
programme.desc: A diplomat and an National Intelligence Service agent headed to Afghanistan to save South Korean missionaries captured by Taliban. They only have 24 hours...

programme.title: Iris: New Generation
programme.desc: Three years after a secret agent's tragic death at the hands of terrorist group IRIS, team leader Joon-han recruits a team to stop IRIS once and for all.

programme.title: Big Match
programme.desc: A man framed for murder battles a game planner who is intent on turning a city into one giant game board that he can control.

programme.title: Good Deal
programme.desc: The stories of worn goods that build bridges between people from all walks of life begin with a little boy trying to buy a second-hand baseball jacket from a former baseball player.

programme.title: My Worst Neighbor
programme.desc: In a house with little soundproofing, a man and a woman living next door started a noise war. They then cohabitate through the wall, and catching up in subtle emotions...

programme.title: Rampant

programme.title: Howling
programme.desc: A detective and his rookie partner probe a murder in which the victim appears to have unusual bite marks.

programme.desc: The series tells the story of a careless single mother and her cool-headed daughter who works as a police officer having a strong family bond, and yet living together with endless bickering in between.

programme.desc: 2PMs Chansung will explore different restaurants, taste popular menus and recreate them with his own recipes!

programme.title: Seoul Check-In Ep10
programme.desc: Lee Hyo-ri has been living in Jeju for the past 9 years, where she stays when she comes to Seoul? This show portrays her double life as the star Lee Hyo-ri and the normal woman Lee Hyo-ri.

programme.title: We Don't Bite: Villains in the Countryside Ep1
programme.desc: The 3 villains from <Penthouse> will have a special holiday in an empty house. Theyll furnish the house to create their own hideout. Guests will join them and enjoy a healing time together.

programme.title: Diary of a Prosecutor Ep9
programme.desc: A hotshot prosecutor has been transferred to a small branch office in a provincial town, threatens to shake up the humdrum routines of her overworked new colleagues.

programme.title: Diary of a Prosecutor Ep10
programme.desc: A hotshot prosecutor has been transferred to a small branch office in a provincial town, threatens to shake up the humdrum routines of her overworked new colleagues.

programme.title: Street Woman Fighter 2 Ep8

programme.title: The Inheritors Season 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Intangible Cultural Heritage refers to the behavior or performance which is important for cultural inheritance in a certain district, such as folk custom, culture, beliefs, traditions, etc. As the theme of this program, the results of protection of intangible cultural heritage could be demonstrated and promoted comprehensively.

programme.title: Our stories Ep11

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep201202
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep47284729
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2102
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3695
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa(T) Ep177
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1857
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1056
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Mama's Affair
programme.desc: Former talent manager Mei Fung stays home to take care of her husband and son after retirement. She decides to re-enter the entertainment business to find her value in life, and successfully transforms a local restaurant delivery boy, Fong Ching, into a young pop idol. This makes her teenage son, Jonathan, intensely jealous of Fong Ching.

programme.title: I Corrupt All Cops
programme.desc: During the time when Hong Kong was under British rule, there was a dark age when corruption and bribery were the order of the day. But in the darkness comes brave individuals who are determined to end corruption with the founding of Hong Kong's anti-corruption bureau in this star-studded crime drama that features Tony Leung Ka Fai, Anthony Wong, Eason Chan and Alex Fong.

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Hawk leads a mercenary team to recover the bronze heads of the 12 Chinese zodiac animals, which were looted by foreigners in the 1800s. With a promise of a 10 times bonus by MP Corp if he can recover all of them, Hawk stops at nothing to accomplish the mission.

programme.title: The Grand Grandmaster
programme.desc: Ma Fei Lung, a Chinese martial arts grandmaster, lost everything after he is floored by a former female boxing champion, Chan Tsang. The relevant video was posted on social media and he became the laughing stock of everyone. To reclaim his reputation, Fei Lung challenges Chan Tsang to a rematch. Who will be the winner?

programme.title: Shaolin vs Evil Dead
programme.desc: Kung fu comedy meets action as the Shaolin monks, Brother White and Brother Black, take on the evil King of the Vampires and his unstoppable army of Darkness.

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: 13 year-old Fen is uprooted from LA and moves to Taipei in early 2003, when her mother is diagnosed with breast cancer. She struggles to adjust to her new life with a new school and long-separated father, and drifts away from her mother. When her younger sister is misdiagnosed with SARS, they finally open up to each other during quarantine.

programme.title: Detective Vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real Chosen Sleuth instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: Kill Mobile
programme.desc: Seven friends get together and decide to play a game where they must share all the messages, calls and app notifications on each other's cell phones. Hilarity and drama follows as everyone's secrets are unveiled throughout the evening, and the seven friends find themselves more like strangers to each other than ever before!

programme.title: The Eye 2
programme.desc: Joey looks to start a new life after a failed suicide attempt but finds herself pregnant and dare not tell her ex-boyfriend. At the same time, she realizes that a mysterious woman is stalking her and begins to hallucinate, leading to a nervous breakdown. Taking advice from an abbot, Joey decides to uncover the truth in order to protect her baby...

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon (2020)
programme.desc: In 1960s Hong Kong, rookie cop Xu Le cracks a robbery but gets demoted instead, as this offends a corrupt inspector. Xu meets a rich girl Bai who falls instantly in love with him one day. Will he break up with his childhood girlfriend for Bai so as to climb the social ladder, and how does Xu eventually become one of Hong Kongs legendary detective?

programme.title: The Bravest Escort Group
programme.desc: A band of courageous bodyguards is tasked with escorting the daughter of general, the concubine of the recently deceased Ming emperor Wu Sangui, and her son, who is the last hope of the Ming Dynasty, to safety.

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Changs first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunts puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: Detrimental
programme.desc: You Ji Ren is a blind man who works at a factory in an outlying island. When the factory is cut off from the outside world by a hurricane one day, a monster appears and turns whoever sees it into black shadows. As You cannot see the monster, he is able to help other coworkers leave safely and fight to kill the monster!

programme.title: Finding Mr. Right
programme.desc: A woman from Beijing, pregnant with the child of her rich married boyfriend, flies to Seattle in order to deliver the baby. She meets a Chinese immigrant man working as a driver there, and as she starts to learn more about him, her life begins to change.

programme.title: Munitions Hijacking Case
programme.desc: Agent Wen is assigned to work undercover for a Southeast Asian military arm dealer to find some munitions and to destroy them. When he finally finds the munitions though, he is attacked by unknown gangsters and has to team up with his partner to recover the munitions so as to prevent a disaster from occurring.

programme.title: Fight Back to School II
programme.desc: Star Chow (Stephen Chow) is an officer in the Royal Hong Kong Police's elite Special Duties Unit (SDU). During a meeting with his senior officer, Inspector Yip (Deanie Ip), Star jokingly suggests he wish to be reassigned to the traffic unit. Star immediately finds himself demoted to Constable engaging in traffic duty on the streets of Hong Kong. After being made the scapegoat for a failed high school terrorist investigation, Star hastily resigns from the police. He decides to enroll at the high school to launch his own private investigation. But Star realises the investigation won't be easy when he discovers that the bumbling, incompetent CID detective Tat (Ng Man Tat) is also undercover at the high school.

programme.title: Grandmaster, The
programme.desc: Directed by the acclaimed filmmaker Wong Kar Wai, this epic action feature begins in Foshan when Ip Man, the martial arts master from the south, takes up a challenge by ageing northern master Gong Yu Tian. Ip Man wins the fight, but is then defeated by Gong Yu Tians daughter Gong Er, with whom he forms an emotional bond

programme.title: The Lost Bladesman
programme.desc: An epic historic adventure set during the turbulent times of the Three Kingdoms. Cao Cao attempts to enlist Guan Yun Chang into his forces, but Guan is loyal to his sworn brother Liu Bei, who is also Caos enemy. As Guan tries to rescue Liu Beis concubine from Cao, he is forced to fight his way through. Can he succeed in the end?

programme.title: A Murder Erased
programme.desc: Police officer Choi is assigned to a death scene investigation where the deceased body had laid undiscovered for eight years. A prosecutor joins the investigation after Choi has identified the suspect, and finds Chois actions suspicious when all manner of inconsistencies come to light from his statement...

programme.title: Look Up
programme.desc: This film celebrates the 25th anniversary of Hong Kongs Handover in a series of four cultural stories about young Hong Kongers from different walks of life: a young man with autism pursuing his dream, a reconciliation between father and son, a Chinese opera star helping young pop singers, and a Nepali youth becoming a professional lion dancer.

programme.title: Hero Among Heroes
programme.desc: Wong Fei Hung assists Lin Ze Xu to crack down the opium trading in Guangzhou. Barac provokes Beggar So to kill Wong and Lin as they hinder his opium business. When So finally resolves his misunderstanding with Wong, he decides to join Wong to defeat Barac and stop the opium import.

programme.title: The Eagle Shooting Heroes
programme.desc: Executive produced by Wong Kar Wai, The Eagle Shooting Heroes is loosely based on Louis Chas classics. Whilst mistaken identity and rampant gender confusion are on the menu, Sammo Hungs action direction and the incredible all-star casts also keep the laughs and thrills coming in this Hong Kong-style crazy comedy.

programme.title: Temporary Family
programme.desc: Hong Kong residential property is reported to be the most expensive in the world. Four young Hong Kong residents, each having their own issues, fall into a property speculation trap and are forced to live together in their new flat.

programme.title: A Simple Life
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is based on a true story. Ah Tao works as a maid for Rogers family for four generations. After they emigrated, she stays only to work for Roger, but is forced to retire and move into an elderly home after she suffered a stroke. Since then, Roger becomes her caregiver as Ah Tao starts adapting to a new life.

programme.title: Hail the Judge
programme.desc: A low level magistrate is run out of town for defending a beautiful murder suspect. Through a series of comedic events he ascends to the top rank & returns looking for revenge.

programme.title: 3Ft Ball and Souls
programme.desc: Members of an internet suicide room called Life Club decide to end their lives using explosives. But every time the fireworks explode, they find themselves back-in-time before they carried out their plan. They suspect the cause of this mystery to be the young age of one of the members and tries to convince the high school girl to quit

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Fok Kit is the hottest underground boxer with unbeatable records. To save their boxing studio from being sold, he must win the fight against Shaolin who is known as "Killing Machine". Fok Kit is defeated and badly hurt in the fight, which is a set-up by Lok, who wants to take revenge on Fok Kits master, Debo.

programme.title: Two Tigers
programme.desc: This crime comedy is about a bumbling young man Fang Nan, who kidnaps a middle-aged businessman Zhang Cheng Gong for ransom. However, the captor becomes the captive when Zhang turns the tables on Fang and forces him to complete three tasks. The two men soon find themselves sharing a journey filled with absurdity and deception.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs
programme.desc: Yan is a police mole in the triad and joined them before he graduated from the police academy, while Ming is a triad mole in the police since young. Leading parallel lives, both men feel increasingly trapped in their false surroundings, and a series of cat-and-mouse chases ensue as both the triad and the police compete to uncover the others mole.

programme.title: The Kiss Addict
programme.desc: One night after a performance, a young, talented violinist Wen Feng receives a kiss from a mysterious woman Duo La in Yalazhen. After that he begins his addiction to kissing. To find out the reason behind this mysterious new addiction, he goes back to Tibet in search of Duo La and ends up uncovering a mystery far beyond his comprehension

programme.title: From Vegas to Macau III
programme.desc: Ken holds a wedding ceremony in Macau for his daughter Rainbow. However, an explosion during the wedding causes Rainbow to fall into coma, while Ken and his friend Mark, are accused of engulfing some illicit money. Enraged, Ken swears to seek vengeance and pursue the mastermind who has gotten them involved in his evil plan.

programme.title: Cliff Walkers
programme.desc: The first spy thriller movie by famous Director Zhang Yi Mou, this film follows four Communist Party special agents who embark on a secret operation in the Japanese puppet state of Manchukuo in 1932. Sold out by a traitor, the agents, who split up into two teams, find themselves surrounded by threats on all sides. Can they complete their mission?

programme.title: Executioners From Shaolin
programme.desc: The White-Browed Priest supports the brutal Qing government, burning down Shaolin Temple and hunting its disciples. Hung from Shaolin falls in love with Fang while escaping from the hunt and the couple have a son before Hung is killed by the Priest. To avenge his father, Hung creates a new form of martial art combining his parents kung fu styles.

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her familys objection, so Hongs maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.title: The Jade Faced Assassin
programme.desc: Two forbidden lovers, Zhang Zhen and Yue Nu, are killed by four villains and left behind their twin babies. Yue Nu's elder sister hopes to restore the clan's honour and separates the twins, arranging for them to be raised by competing clans. 18 years later, the twins meet and fight against each other, bringing chaos to the martial arts world.

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: The story follows Monk Tang San Zangs (Ho Fan) journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey (Yueh Hua), Pigsy (Peng Peng) and Sha Wu Jing (Tien Shun).

programme.title: The Silver Fox
programme.desc: The formidable swordswoman Silver Fox was a child when her father was senselessly wounded by his step brother, and her mother raped. It is payback time eighteen years later, as her father trains her up with kung fu to take revenge on his behalf.

programme.title: Call of the Sea
programme.desc: A young fisherman, Chin Hu is in love with his childhood friend Hsiao Yu. However, the only son of a town bully lusts after Hsiao Yus beauty and tries all possible ways to approach her. Chin Hu protects another woman from the bully one day, leading Hsiao Yu to misunderstand him and suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: Temple Of The Red Lotus
programme.desc: Wang Yu plays a young guy, Wu, who heads off to Dragon Valley to meet his childhood friend, Lian Chu (Chin Ping), who was promised to be his bride. When he gets there, he finds out that the family of his bride might not be an entirely honest bunch of people. Wu wishes to take Lian Chu with him, so he has no choice but to fight against her family

programme.title: The House of 72 Tenants
programme.desc: The 72 inhabitants of a dilapidated tenement live under the thumb of a heartless landlady and her sleazy husband. The arrival of a defiant new tenant however, changes their fate. The residents pool their resources together to prevent evictions, deflect targeted harassment by a corrupt policeman and ultimately prevent their home from being sold.

programme.title: Heroes Of Sung
programme.desc: Heroes Of Sung stars one of the original kung fu ladies of the silver screen, Shih Szu, who plays swordswoman Meng Hung. She must work with Fan Tien-Fu, played by Lo Lieh to find and protect the royal seals of the Sung Dynasty. Shih's magnificent performance earned her the female hero role in another hit Dracula And The 7 Golden Vampires.

programme.title: The Comedy of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sisters wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: Murder Plot
programme.desc: Martial artist Shen Lang is in discussions with kung fu experts from the other six sects to plot the downfall of the traitorous Happy King when his fiance suddenly disrupts them and Shen has to quickly bring her away. As they continue to pursue the Happy King, both Shen and his fiance accidentally fall into a trap set up by the King.

programme.title: Long Road to Gallantry
programme.desc: Tu Meng Fei makes his way to the world after completing his kung fu training. En route, he rescues Mu Wan Erh and Li San Nan from a band of thugs and later learnt of a 20-year conflict between the evil Thunder Gang Chief Leng Tian Lei and the Dragon Sect. Mus lost father is none other than the Thunder Gang Chief, who also killed Lis father

programme.title: Forever And Ever
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po plays a young scholar who is manipulated into marrying a nobleman's reluctant daughter. After marrying, he soon discovers the reason for her hesitation. She is stricken with a contagious disease. But, with the power of true love, their romance prevails.

programme.title: Village of Tigers
programme.desc: The devilish residents of the Village of Tigers, led by Hu Jiao, plan to kill Lo Hong Shun, otherwise known as the heroic Sword of the Southern Sky. Hu Jiao sees a way to use the righteousness of the honorable Ba family to help him kill the hero Lo by turning them against him. Will good prevail over evil?

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: The Deadly Breaking Sword
programme.desc: Warrior Tuan Chang Qing meets courtesan Liu Yin Xi in a small town. Liu pleads Tuan to kill the underworld master Guo Tian Sheng, known as the "Killer Doctor", in order to avenge the death of her fiance. Tuan and gambling addict Xiao Dao breaks into Guo's household, triggering the battle of good against evil.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: The Eunuch
programme.desc: A year before Lo Wei directed Bruce Lee in Fist Of Fury, he wrote and co-starred in this tale of a treacherous devil who wants nothing less than supreme power...and doesn't care if he has to murder the Emperor and use his own daughter as a deadly dupe to get it.

programme.title: The Last Tempest
programme.desc: This sequel to The Empress Dowager continues the tale of Emperor Guangxu and Empress Dowager Cixi. Despite Guangxus enthronement, his ability to rule effectively is overshadowed by the ever-present power of Cixi. When his attempts to reform the Imperial system are thwarted by the Empress Dowager, Guangxu attempts to curb her power.

programme.title: My Rebellious Son
programme.desc: A corrupt official attempts to steal a priceless Buddha statue from a temple to please a group of Westerners. Luckily, Doctor Zhang and his son manage to defeat the Western boxers, the Japanese Kendo opponents and the Western longsword fighters with Chinese kung fu, thus saving the Buddha statue.

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: The Lady Assassin
programme.desc: Two feuding princes fight for the throne in the Qing Dynasty, causing many injuries and deaths to the commoners. Can the lady assassin who is drawn into this royal feud execute her assassination mission in time to help one of the princes secure the throne?

programme.title: The Mad Monk Strikes Again
programme.desc: The Mad Monk is up against the equally legendary scholar-turned-genie, Lu Tung Pin. The duo create havoc as they vie with each other, be it in mirth, magic, women or weapons!

programme.title: Mr. Funnybone Strikes Again
programme.desc: In this hilarious sequel, Mr Big Potato opens an old-fashioned Chinese clinic, but his traditional methods are rejected by the sceptics of modern Hong Kong. Enter his buddy Mr Funny bone to rescue his business!

programme.title: The Brave Archer
programme.desc: On his way back to the midlands, Guo Jing meets Huang Rong and they quickly fall in love. However, Ouyang Ke proposes to marry Huang Rong at the same time, so Huangs father sets up a duel for the two men to compete for her hand. Guo Jing finally beats Ouyang Ke to win Huang Rong back.

programme.title: The Knight of Knights
programme.desc: Wen Su Chen, the leader of seven knights, sends his six sworn brothers to investigate a monastery. Unfortunately, they are killed by an abbot who plans to murder Inspector Lin. Wen saved Lin and battles the abbot to avenge his dead sworn brothers. With Lin and his armys help, they bring down the ruthless monks in the monastery.

programme.title: Lover's Rock
programme.desc: Pan Lei, winner the China Literary Award for three consecutive years, wrote and directed this film about the lives and loves of a fishing village. It starred the glorious Cheng Pei-pei in her first film as a woman (she had debuted in a mans role), and her much-lauded performance won her the prestigious Golden Accolade Award from the International Association Of Independent Producers a first for any Asian woman.

programme.title: Ten Tigers of Kwang Tung
programme.desc: The Ten Tigers of Kwang Tung is a group of anti-Ching martial artists who have killed a Ching official. Years later, when five disciples and descendants of Ten Tigers meet one night, one of them is killed by the son of the late Ching official who returns with a vengeance. They must fight against him to protect the Ten Tigers clan

programme.title: Torrent Of Desire
programme.desc: Rich playboy David is a drunk until he falls in love with a fashion model Dan Feng and marries her. David's sister Mona is in love with his best friend Han Ming, who rejected her as he secretly loves Dan Feng as well. Out of jealousy and hatred, Mona lies to David about a fake affair between Han Ming and Dan Feng...

programme.title: Vengeance Of A Snow Girl
programme.desc: A crippled woman seeks vengeance against the four men who killed her parents. However, when she crosses path with a young warrior who falls in love with her, trouble ensues as his father is one of the killers responsible for her family's massacre years ago.

programme.title: Double Bliss
programme.desc: Double Bliss tells the story of two students who fall in love and want to wed, but there is one small snag: their parents don't agree! The two ingenious lovebirds come up with what they think is a foolproof plan...They play dead!

programme.title: The Golden Buddha
programme.desc: A map indicating the location of the Chans family heirloom is hidden in three Golden Buddha statues. Paul, an insurance agent, finds one statue by chance and Chans daughter has another one. This makes them targets of treasure-hunting criminals and they have to team up to defeat them before unveiling the hidden secrets.

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Changs. On the Changs farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: Rolls, Rolls, I Love You
programme.desc: Three young men offend a billionaire and are drawn into a high stakes bet. If they win, they get to keep the billionaires Rolls Royce. Otherwise, they will need to pay the rich man fifty thousand dollars! Will the underdogs win the bet?

programme.title: Super Police
programme.desc: Tamil Action Thriller Film, Starring, Ram Charan, Priyanka Chopra, Mahie Gill, Sanjay Dutt & Others

programme.title: Lakshmi
programme.desc: Tamil Musical Dance Film, Starring, Ditya Bhande, Prabhu Deva, Salman Yusuff Khan, Aishwarya Rajesh, Chaams & Others

programme.desc: Tamil Coming-of-Age Comedy Film, Starring, Siva Karthikeyan, Bindhu Mathavi, Vimal, Soori & Regina Cassandra

programme.desc: Tamil Thriller Film, Starring, Ram, Mysskin, Poorna & Others

programme.desc: Tamil Action drama film, Starring - Mahesh Babu, Keerthy Suresh & Samuthirakani

programme.desc: Tamil comedy drama film, Starring - RJ Balaji, Sathyaraj, Urvashi, Aparna Balamurali, K.P.A.C. Lalitha

programme.desc: Tamil Action Movie, Starring, Vijay Yesudas, P. Bharathiraja, Singampuli, Mahanadi Shankar & Others

programme.title: Salim
programme.desc: Indian Tamil action thriller film starring Vijay Antony and Aksha Pardasany.

programme.title: Pattathu Yaanai
programme.desc: action - masala Tamil film starring Vishal Krishna and Aishwarya Arjun, Santhanam

programme.desc: Tamil Film, Starring, M.S. Bhaskar, Chinnijayanth, Nassar, Nikesha Patel, Shakthi Vasudevan & Others

programme.title: Yaman
programme.desc: Tamil Action Film, Starring, Vijay Antony, Mia George, Thiyagarajan & Others

programme.title: Cocktail
programme.desc: Tamil Comedy Film, starring Yogi Babu, Rashmi Gopinath, Mithun

programme.desc: Tamil Horror Movie, Starring, Baby Sathanya, Manoj Bharathiraja, Shira Gaarg, Srivarshini & Others

programme.desc: Film Songs

programme.title: Vellakara Durai
programme.desc: A blockbuster Comedy Family Entertainer set in the backdrops of a village with Vikram Prabhu, Soori and Sri Divya in the lead

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Tamil Horror Thriller Film, Starring, Nayantara, Thambi Ramaiah, Harish Uthaman, Sulile Kumar, Shan & Others

programme.title: Gully Rowdy
programme.desc: Tamil Romantic Comedy Film, Starring, Sundeep Kishan, Neha Shetty, Bobby Simha & Others

programme.title: Vanamagan
programme.desc: An Andaman tribal who escapes from men trying to capture his people, ends up in the care of a spoilt, rich girl, who starts to fall in love with him. The Film features Jayam Ravi & Sayeesha in the lead roles

programme.title: Kodiveeran
programme.desc: Tamil Action Film, Starring, M. Sasikumar, Shamna Kasim, Mahima Nambiar, Sanusha, Inder Kumar & Others

programme.title: Thalaivi
programme.desc: Thalaivi is a Indian historical drama, which is loosely based on the life of the late Tamil Nadu Chief Minister Jayalalithaa, Starring,'Kangana Ranaut, Arvind Swami

programme.desc: Tamil Action Drama Film, Starring, Dhanush, Lal, Rajisha Vijayan, Yogi Babu

programme.title: Elvis
programme.desc: From Oscar-nominated visionary filmmaker Baz Luhrmann comes Warner Bros. Pictures' drama Elvis, starring Austin Butler and Oscar winner Tom Hanks.The film explores the life and music of Elvis Presley (Butler), seen through the prism of his complicated relationship with his enigmatic manager, Colonel Tom Parker (Hanks). The story delves into the complex dynamic between Presley and Parker spanning over 20 years, from Presley's rise to fame to his unprecedented stardom, against the backdrop of the evolving cultural landscape and loss of innocence in America. Central to that journey is one of the most significant and influential people in Elvis's life, Priscilla Presley (Olivia DeJonge).'

programme.title: Aquaman (2018)
programme.desc: Once home to the most advanced civilization on Earth, the city of Atlantis is now an underwater kingdom ruled by the power-hungry King Orm. With a vast army at his disposal, Orm plans to conquer the remaining oceanic people -- and then the surface world. Standing in his way is Aquaman, Orm's half-human, half-Atlantean brother and true heir to the throne. With help from royal counselor Vulko, Aquaman must retrieve the legendary Trident of Atlan and embrace his destiny as protector of the deep.

programme.title: Making It S2 Ep1
programme.desc: What Are You Made Of? - From executive producers and hosts Amy Poehler and Nick Offerman comes a lighthearted competition celebrating the creativity and craftiness in all of us. Each week, a group of Makers from all over the country will compete in two handmade projects one timed, the other themed cleverly designed by Amy and Nick to test the Makers' ability to get creative. Each challenge will bring out their skills and insights, as well as their touching personal stories and, of course, plenty of laughter and fun for everyone. Then, in the end, one talented artisan will be crowned "Master Maker."

programme.desc: Judge Me Not - When Hawaii Supreme Court nominee Judge Rachel Park (Moon Bloodgood) is being blackmailed, she hires Magnum and Higgins who go to extraordinary lengths to help her out.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S4 Ep14
programme.desc: Run, Baby, Run - A bail bondsman hires Magnum and Higgins to track down a woman who skipped out on her $250,000 bond.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S4 Ep15
programme.desc: Dead Man Walking - When Magnum balks at notorious crime boss Osi Shimas (Eijiro Ozaki) request to find his missing son, Magnum learns hes been poisoned.

programme.title: Pulse Ep1
programme.desc: Crunch - A troubled video game designer and her team find themselves in bizarre circumstances which mirror the video game they have created. Trapped in a toxic building, she must help her colleagues escape. Its no longer a game.

programme.title: Pulse Ep2
programme.desc: Down The Rabbit Hole - Jaz, Errol, Dom and Caspar begin to test the shifting boundaries of their own and others psychosis. Around them, the building assumes a malevolent life of its own.

programme.title: Pulse Ep3
programme.desc: Wonderland - Eddie and Denny engineer another classic game-play staple: A race-against time for a life hanging in the balance. Jaz determines they will pass that test, win that race, save that life. An unlikely source thinks otherwise.

programme.title: Pulse Ep4
programme.desc: Through The Looking Glass - Eddie snatches the most vulnerable player from their grasp. All but Jaz thinks hes dead. Its worse. A re-introduction to the monster in his past. Our heroes frantic search for him leads to other levels.

programme.title: Pulse Ep5
programme.desc: Kindred Spirits - Jaz finally manages to utilise her evolving skills of perception to locate their missing player. Our team descends to the lowest levels of the building only to find their deadliest threat yet.

programme.title: Pulse Ep6
programme.desc: Smoke & Mirrors - As they run, Jaz slips into her own sense of hell which is mirrored in the vile contents of the building. With the exit finally in front of them, it seems the tutorial may be complete, but the game is far from over.

programme.title: Pulse Ep1
programme.desc: Crunch - A troubled video game designer and her team find themselves in bizarre circumstances which mirror the video game they have created. Trapped in a toxic building, she must help her colleagues escape. Its no longer a game.

programme.desc: A soldier long thought dead in battle returns to wreak havoc on mankind as a punishment for the fact that he was genetically engineered by a corrupt company.

programme.title: Any Bullet Will Do
programme.desc: Two brothers find themselves on opposing sides of the fight as one hopes to help abolish slavery while the other believes it is his God-given right

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: An imprisoned drug kingpin offers a huge cash reward to anyone that can break him out of police custody, and only the L.A.P.D.'s Special Weapons and Tactics team can prevent it.

programme.title: Raiders Of The Lost Ark
programme.desc: Archeologist-adventurer Indiana Jones masterfully vanquishes all manner of foe while in search for the Ark of the Covenant in this action packed adventure. Nominated for 2 Academy Awards including Best Picture.

programme.title: Indiana Jones And The Temple Of Doom
programme.desc: In this box office smash, Indiana Jones must rescue some missing children kidnapped by religious terrorists in the Orient who happen to possess some stolen, sacred jewels.

programme.title: Indiana Jones And The Last Crusade
programme.desc: After settling down to a quieter life, Indy is thrust back into action when his father mysteriously disappears while on a quest for the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Indiana Jones And The Kingdom Of The Crystal Skull
programme.desc: Famed archaeologist/adventurer Dr. Henry 'Indiana' Jones is called back into action when he becomes entangled in a Soviet plot to uncover the secret behind mysterious artifacts known as the Crystal Skulls.

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: American soldiers get a brutal education when a mission gone awry results in the U.S. military's single biggest firefight since Vietnam.

programme.title: Gangs Of New York
programme.desc: In 1863, Amsterdam Vallon returns to the Five Points area of New York City seeking revenge against Bill the Butcher, his father's killer.

programme.title: The Shepherd
programme.desc: A texas cop battles ex-navy seals who are trying to traffic drugs from Mexico into the USA.

programme.title: In The Line Of Fire
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent seeks to redeem himself by saving the life of his country's highest elected official, even if it means sacrificing his own.

programme.title: Swarmed
programme.desc: A small town decides to use a very potent and untested pesticide on yellow-jacket wasps plaguing the town However, the species has now mutated and is now stronger, more aggressive, hungrier and interested in LIVE human meat.

programme.title: In Isolation

programme.title: Race Across the World S3 Ep9
programme.desc: With a thrilling third series of the Bafta-winning adventure now over, our five pairs meet up again to reflect on the adventure of a lifetime.

programme.title: Chasing Monsters S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Unexplained Sightings - Cyril's attention is captured by tourist videos of unidentified creatures appearing in the Gulf of Mexico. Discovering and trying to catch these monsters becomes an obsession. But, is it even a fish?

programme.title: Inside the Factory S7 Ep8
programme.desc: Rice Pudding - Gregg Wallace and Cherry Healey find out what it takes for a factory to churn out 360,000 cans of rice pudding every day.

programme.title: Deadly Predators S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Predator Power - Steve goes in search of some of the most powerful predators on the planet. At historic Warwick Castle, we meet the stellar sea eagle, the world's heaviest eagle.

programme.title: Deadly Predators S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Super Senses - Steve goes in search of Deadly Predators with the greatest super-senses on earth. From echolocating bats to supersonic whales, and a snake that sees its prey in complete darkness.

programme.title: South Korea with Alexander Armstrong S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Alexander visits the awesome Gyeongbokgung Palace, picks something up at the vast Yangnyeongsi herbal market, and even takes a look at the lucrative culture of fortune-telling.

programme.title: Supercharged Otters
programme.desc: Charlie Hamilton James has filmed otters for over 25 years and now, through a set of groundbreaking experiments and incredible wild encounters, Charlie wants to reveal why he believes they're so special.

programme.title: Michael Palin - Into Iraq S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Michael continues his journey into the heart of Iraq on his way to Baghdad, and arrives in Kirkuk and the exact spot where the British discovered oil in 1927, when they also ruled the country. The next day, Michael heads towards Tikrit, Saddam Hussein's hometown. Having been stopped at several military checkpoints along the way, but is surprised when he receives a warm welcome from the local commander and coins it 'Checkpoint Cheerful'.

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Kyrgyzstan - Steve and the team head to remotest Kyrgyzstan in search of snow leopards - if the team can find evidence of the endangered big cat, they could protect the region.

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls S4 Ep4
programme.desc: Uzo Aduba - Dropped amidst snow capped mountains, Uzo and Bear move quickly as a storm sets in, sending hail, lightning and flash floods their way.

programme.desc: An old and deserted dry dock is transformed into an amazing subterranean museum, after the engineers drain the entire ground and build a new concrete base.

programme.desc: Keri Russell - Actress Keri Russell joins Bear on an epic journey to the Canary Islands off the coast of Africa. After battling the dangerous, rolling rocks of a massive volcano, the duo descend into a canyon.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S6 Ep2
programme.desc: Socks - Gregg Wallace gets to grips with socks at a factory in Leicester.

programme.title: Snow Dogs: Into the Wild
programme.desc: Wildlife adventurer Gordon Buchanan uses a dog team to retrace the steps of famous arctic explorers and examine the ancient relationship between man and dog.

programme.title: Coast New Zealand S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Kaipara Harbour - Kaipara Harbour is thought to have claimed up to 150 shipwrecks since the 1840s. Neil Oliver hits Ripiro Beach in a blokart, and is treated to a sound and light show at Gibbs Farm.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S3 Ep12
programme.desc: Devastating floods trap residents in Australia, a base jumper gets stranded in freezing temperatures and a destructive hail storm batters Texas.

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls S4 Ep6
programme.desc: Don Cheadle - Movie star Don Cheadle joins Bear on a 48-hour trek through the unrelenting White Mountains of New England. It's rugged, remote and full of dangerous rivers.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Land of Extremes - This episode visually illustrates how the Arctic, locked in darkness for nearly seven months, springs to life once the sun rises above the horizon. We explore ideas of migration, hibernation, the food web and habitat change, and are introduced to some of the Arctics most magnificent and iconic creatures and its most dramatic landscapes.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 Ep3
programme.desc: The Missing Manzi - Join Julz and park scout Simon Chulu as they track the Kakuli pack, who they filmed last year, and a Manzi faction whove ditched a tracking collar and broken away from the group. Spot the Kakumbi making a kill before a happy Manzi reunion ensues.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Kakumbi Are Vulnerable - Encounter an elephant as Julz and Henry from the ZCP track the Kakumbi pups, who face off with a stubborn, razor-tusked warthog. Follow Thandie Mweetwa, ZCPs lion specialist, who counts the prides that are pushing the Manzi out of their territory.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Baby Sea Otter Finds a Family - Join the vet and his team in saving a massive sea lion caught in a plastic noose, and then visit the Rescue Center, where a harbor seal pup may lose its eyesight and a baby sea otter needs a risky but life-saving surgery.

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Drought Begins - The Luangwa Valley in Zambia experiences one of the toughest dry seasons imaginable. Seven months with no rain and spiraling temperatures. And with this years El Nino conditions the drought is threatening to be even more intense than usual.

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Life in the Furnace - Its October in Zambias Luangwa Valley. The hottest and harshest time of year. But this year dry season conditions are exacerbated by a global El Nio event the Valley is in the throes of drought. Theres been no rain since April and desperate animals are drawn to the only remaining source of water in the Valley the dwindling Luangwa River. The last remaining deep pools are inhabited by hippos hundreds squashed together in the only water deep enough to submerge them. As tempers flare and skirmishes break out, its a dangerous place for baby hippos, dwarfed by the three-tonne adults.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep12
programme.desc: Seasons - Wild Wild East travels through time and space to show what one-year and four seasons looks like for the wildest animals of Canadas East-Coast.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Secret Life of Bugs & Butterflies - At first glance, the tropical forests of Australia seem empty and still. But look closer and they are packed with life. Few places in the country contain such a high diversity of insects as here. From the canopy to the forest floor, insects cram into every space and they must fight to survive. In this great battle for life, insects have adopted extraordinary survival strategies: jumping spiders disguise themselves as ants; ants use their larvae as glue-guns to build elaborate tree-top camps; what look like leaves are in fact stick-insects.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Under Pressure - As food and water become scarce, Crystal, the fierce leader of the Ruins gang, sets her sights on rival Katis territory and its neighboring fruit trees. Watch as Crystals move and a raid by outside invaders lead to dire consequences for one troop.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 2 Ep6
programme.desc: Vancouver Island - Journey to the wild Pacific coast on the western shore of Vancouver Island in British Columbia. From the peaks of mountain glaciers to the canopies of Canadas only rainforest, nature and human spirit coexist in spectacular habitats.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Land of Extremes - This episode visually illustrates how the Arctic, locked in darkness for nearly seven months, springs to life once the sun rises above the horizon. We explore ideas of migration, hibernation, the food web and habitat change, and are introduced to some of the Arctics most magnificent and iconic creatures and its most dramatic landscapes.

programme.desc: The Missing Manzi - Join Julz and park scout Simon Chulu as they track the Kakuli pack, who they filmed last year, and a Manzi faction whove ditched a tracking collar and broken away from the group. Spot the Kakumbi making a kill before a happy Manzi reunion ensues.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Kakumbi Are Vulnerable - Encounter an elephant as Julz and Henry from the ZCP track the Kakumbi pups, who face off with a stubborn, razor-tusked warthog. Follow Thandie Mweetwa, ZCPs lion specialist, who counts the prides that are pushing the Manzi out of their territory.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Baby Sea Otter Finds a Family - Join the vet and his team in saving a massive sea lion caught in a plastic noose, and then visit the Rescue Center, where a harbor seal pup may lose its eyesight and a baby sea otter needs a risky but life-saving surgery.

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Drought Begins - The Luangwa Valley in Zambia experiences one of the toughest dry seasons imaginable. Seven months with no rain and spiraling temperatures. And with this years El Nino conditions the drought is threatening to be even more intense than usual.

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Life in the Furnace - Its October in Zambias Luangwa Valley. The hottest and harshest time of year. But this year dry season conditions are exacerbated by a global El Nio event the Valley is in the throes of drought. Theres been no rain since April and desperate animals are drawn to the only remaining source of water in the Valley the dwindling Luangwa River. The last remaining deep pools are inhabited by hippos hundreds squashed together in the only water deep enough to submerge them. As tempers flare and skirmishes break out, its a dangerous place for baby hippos, dwarfed by the three-tonne adults.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Secret Life of Bugs & Butterflies - At first glance, the tropical forests of Australia seem empty and still. But look closer and they are packed with life. Few places in the country contain such a high diversity of insects as here. From the canopy to the forest floor, insects cram into every space and they must fight to survive. In this great battle for life, insects have adopted extraordinary survival strategies: jumping spiders disguise themselves as ants; ants use their larvae as glue-guns to build elaborate tree-top camps; what look like leaves are in fact stick-insects.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep13
programme.desc: Deer - In Hampton, New Brunswick the deer population is running wild. In the summer locals struggle to maintain their crops from growing fawns and hungry does. Sightings have reached an all time high and residents fear the overpopulation may be at its tipping point.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 2 Ep6
programme.desc: Vancouver Island - Journey to the wild Pacific coast on the western shore of Vancouver Island in British Columbia. From the peaks of mountain glaciers to the canopies of Canadas only rainforest, nature and human spirit coexist in spectacular habitats.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Land of Extremes - This episode visually illustrates how the Arctic, locked in darkness for nearly seven months, springs to life once the sun rises above the horizon. We explore ideas of migration, hibernation, the food web and habitat change, and are introduced to some of the Arctics most magnificent and iconic creatures and its most dramatic landscapes.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 Ep3
programme.desc: The Missing Manzi - Join Julz and park scout Simon Chulu as they track the Kakuli pack, who they filmed last year, and a Manzi faction whove ditched a tracking collar and broken away from the group. Spot the Kakumbi making a kill before a happy Manzi reunion ensues.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Kakumbi Are Vulnerable - Encounter an elephant as Julz and Henry from the ZCP track the Kakumbi pups, who face off with a stubborn, razor-tusked warthog. Follow Thandie Mweetwa, ZCPs lion specialist, who counts the prides that are pushing the Manzi out of their territory.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Baby Sea Otter Finds a Family - Join the vet and his team in saving a massive sea lion caught in a plastic noose, and then visit the Rescue Center, where a harbor seal pup may lose its eyesight and a baby sea otter needs a risky but life-saving surgery.

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Drought Begins - The Luangwa Valley in Zambia experiences one of the toughest dry seasons imaginable. Seven months with no rain and spiraling temperatures. And with this years El Nino conditions the drought is threatening to be even more intense than usual.

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Life in the Furnace - Its October in Zambias Luangwa Valley. The hottest and harshest time of year. The last remaining deep pools are inhabited by hippos hundreds squashed together in the only water deep enough to submerge them. As tempers flare and skirmishes break out, its a dangerous place for baby hippos, dwarfed by the three-tonne adults.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep14
programme.desc: Whales - Brier Island is at the western point of the Bay of Fundy in Nova Scotia. And in the surrounding waters live an incredible number of humpback whales and dolphins. On still waters, Humpbacks smash their tails, flap their fins, and breach one en masse. Its an incredible sight. A pod of dolphins swims into the Bay of Fundy, feeding off herring. Theyre soon joined by an Orca that capitalizes on their feeding strategies.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Madagascar - Madagascar is home to strange animals not found anywhere else on Earth. When these animals fight for supremacy, their battles are just as strange - from weird neck-wrestling weevils to ring-tailed lemur moms that go into battle with baby on board.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 Ep7
programme.desc: The Waterhole - While many think of coastlines and deserts when they think of Australia, there are other secret pockets of paradise that are home to some of the most intriguing and iconic of its animals: the waterholes. The freshwater wetlands and waterholes in the tropical far North of the country are among the most diverse ecosystems, hosting an extraordinary array of birds, insects, fish and freshwater crocodiles.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Risk and Reward - The drought is finally over, but traversing the forest for food is still a gamble. See some leaders take the risk, leaving home territories undefended to feast on a cicada boom. When they return, trespassers are ready for a fight.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Punks on the Run - The lions of the Nomad pride rampage deep into the heart of the MK prides territory, scattering its members and coming dangerously close to the five new MK cubs. Meanwhile, the Hollywoods are recovering, and Avas survival skills are still intact.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Battle to Save a Sea Lion - Battle wind and waves to find a sea lion trapped in a plastic ring. Then visit the rescue center, where over 80 orphan seals must be fed several times a day to prepare for release into the wild, and see an Amazonian duck get a miraculous operation.

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 Ep1

programme.desc: How to Catch a Lizard - Tag along as Dr. Amanda rescues a blind pet baboon, and watch Dr. Charlottes tricky surgery on a pangolin whose leg must be amputated after a run-in with poachers. Later, chase a rhino, two young baboons gone AWOL, and a fiesty monitor lizard.

programme.desc: An Island Home - Face a tough decision when Estis leg infection puts the brakes on this young duikers release. Then track and collar a young lion with Dr. Amanda; check on an ailing bush baby; and greet the noisy new addition to the center, a grumpy grey parrot.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Australia - Australia is home to an eclectic array of creatures, and the ways to succeed as an alpha are just as diverse. The beach turns into a dueling ground, and the outback becomes a boxing ring, as animals face off with their own kind.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Savanna - The African savanna is an epic landscape, and whether its head-bashing hippos, hormone-crazed elephants or dueling lions, battles that rage on the savanna are just as epic.

programme.title: Animals Decoded 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Body Language - Join researchers as they study how animals communicate. Find out how wolves use their body language to unite the pack and maintain a sophisticated social structure, and see the astounding number of gestures chimps use to communicate.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Road to Independence - As the babies grow, new power struggles break out in each troop. Watch as every member, from fierce Queen Crystal to low-ranking Erica, jockeys for position. Meanwhile, the babies start to understand how allies and enemies will shape their future.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Punks Strike Back - After the dry season lowers the waters, siblings Kimba and Maya risk crossing the river to search for their parents. They run the gauntlet of the densest populations of crocs and hippos in Africa, and face an even greater threat on the other side.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 Ep3
programme.desc: One Very Lost Sea Turtle - Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Ep18
programme.desc: The Paperbirds / Rock And Egg Roll - A gang of crooks mistakes Archibald for a criminal mastermind. Archibald unearths a rock with mysterious and feather-raising powers.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep18
programme.desc: Daddy Julien - King Julien believes Mort is the son he never knew he had despite the fact that Mort is two years older than him.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep37
programme.desc: Lucky and the Resolutionary Fever - Lucky rushes to complete all of last years resolutions before the clock strikes midnight on New Years Eve

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep31
programme.desc: A Stu is Born / Ruffspringa - Richie assembles a team to turn Stu into a social media celebrity. Richie's sheltered dog, Dollar, is adorable -- but he doesn't get out much.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep31
programme.desc: Treasure Of The Sierra Marty/Big Baby - Chet, Skidmark and Smoove Move bring swamp toad Marty on an adventure; The snails fumble taking care of a lost human child left at the taco stand.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep18
programme.desc: The Big Sleep-Walk / Of Course You Can - When Ian starts to sleepwalk around Harmony Harbor, TZG secretly guides him back to his own bed where he can continue sleeping safely. / When Felicia wants to run an obstacle course for the first time but is afraid shell embarrass herself, TZG secretly boosts her confidence by helping with practice.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Ep18
programme.desc: The Paperbirds / Rock And Egg Roll - A gang of crooks mistakes Archibald for a criminal mastermind. Archibald unearths a rock with mysterious and feather-raising powers.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep24
programme.desc: Smidgician / DJ's Got Talent - Smidge tries to rescue the Trolls after thinking she has magical powers/ DJ Suki tries to impress her favorite niece CJ Suki

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep24
programme.desc: Clickety Clacks / Rocksy's Thing - Rocksys talent goes to her head when she and Berry accidentally invent tap dancing. / Rocksy finds one end of a shoelace and tasks her friends with helping her free it so she can have a thing of her very own.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep37
programme.desc: Cat Fish - When pirates force Puss to face his fear of water by walking the ship's plank, he is rescued by his ex-girlfriend and fish monster, Feejee the Mermaid.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep48
programme.desc: Teambuilding - The combined villains have taken over Baby Corp HQ, and a disastrous chupie teleportation accident has all the office babies scattered to the wind. Boss has to regain his leadership gusto to convince Baby Corp to regroup, as Tim and Danny share an emotional last day together before Danny leaves town for good.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep49
programme.desc: Theo 100 - With the Baby Corp babies exiled from their office and hiding in the Templeton basement, Boss and a trusted team storm Baby Corp to take it back from the villains. Having decided to retire and pass the CEO-ship onto to Staci, he also prepares Tim for her new life as an older brother to just a normal baby brother.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep47
programme.desc: Gold Rush - Hiccup and the Riders, with help from Dagur hatch a plan to steal Berk's gold back.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep48
programme.desc: Out Of The Frying Pan - When the Eruptodon can't take its egg into the Great Volcano, Hiccup and Fishlegs must go into the dangerous volcano with the egg before it's too late.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep23
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Crazy Caustic Spray of the Contagious Cruelius Sneezer - In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep24
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Trashy Tale of the Tumultuous Tubbadump - In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep10
programme.desc: The Knight's Fall Part 1 - Po and Blade rush to warn the Emperor about the weasels, but he has Po arrested and Colin captures Blade, revealing that she was never a knight. Thrown in a cell, Po reunites with Rukhmini and Mr. Ping, and he copes with the truth about Blade as they break out. Po fights Klaus and Veruca but is outmatched. Blade defeats Colin and hurries to help Po but is too late.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep11
programme.desc: The Knight's Fall Part 2 - Blade tells Po the truth about Alfie. The group chases after Klaus and Veruca in an epic snowy mountain chase, culminating in Po saving Blades life as the weasels take off with the gauntlet and the whip. Rukhmini reveals that she actually has the real whip in her staff, and she knows where to go to get the next one: India.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep24
programme.desc: Smidgician / DJ's Got Talent - Smidge tries to rescue the Trolls after thinking she has magical powers/ DJ Suki tries to impress her favorite niece CJ Suki
